General.Name: Selvaag Bolig ASA
General.Description: Selvaag Bolig ASA, a housing development company, engages in the development, construction, and sale of residential properties in Greater Oslo, Bergen, Stavanger, Trondheim, and Stockholm. The company also offers project management services. Selvaag Bolig ASA was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway. Selvaag Bolig ASA is a subsidiary of Selvaag AS.

3.Name: Mr. Kristoffer  Gregersen
3.Title: Exec. VP of Communications, Sustainability & Corp. Strategy
